eu.tivian.hardware.Pin

Package Description
eu.tivian.hardware
Custom chips implementation and chip communication providers.

Common logic chips.

    Fields in eu.tivian.hardware.logic declared as Pin 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    Pin QuadDemux.A0
    First input signal.
    Pin QuadDemux.A1
    Second input signal.
    Pin DFlipFlop.clock
    Clock signal triggered by LOW to HIGH transition.
    Pin IC74LS175.clock
    Clock signal.
    Pin MOS6529.cs
    When HIGH the data bus is changed to HI-Z state.
    private Pin DualMux.enable
    Controls if output is in HI-Z state or not.
    Pin IC74LS257.enable
    Chip select signal.
    Pin QuadDemux.enable
    When HIGH all output pins are held HIGH.
    Pin TriState.enable
    Signal controlling the state of the output pin.
    Pin DFlipFlop.input
    Single input signal.
    Pin TriState.input
    Input signal.
    Pin DualMux.inputA
    Chosen when DualMux.enable and DualMux.select pins are held LOW.
    Pin LogicGate.inputA
    First input signal.
    Pin DualMux.inputB
    Chosen when DualMux.enable pin is held LOW and DualMux.select pin is at HIGH level.
    Pin LogicGate.inputB
    Second input signal.
    Pin QuadDemux.O0
    First output signal.
    Pin QuadDemux.O1
    Second output signal.
    Pin QuadDemux.O2
    Third output signal.
    Pin QuadDemux.O3
    Forth output signal.
    Pin DFlipFlop.output
    Output signal.
    Pin DualMux.output
    Outputs either signal from first or second input only if DualMux.enable pin is held LOW.
    Pin LogicGate.output
    Output signal.
    Pin TriState.output
    Output signal which according to the TriState.enable is either equal to level of TriState.input or HI-Z.
    Pin DFlipFlop.reset
    Reset signal which restores output to LOW level and reverse output to HIGH level.
    Pin IC74LS175.reset
    Master reset signal.
    Pin DFlipFlop.revOut
    Reverse output signal.
    Pin MOS6529.rw
    When HIGH the levels on port bus are copied to the data bus.
    private Pin DualMux.select
    Selects which input should be present at the output.
    Pin IC74LS257.select
    Input select signal.
